events.text: I did it! I escaped the dark realm!
Well done, stranger. You have proven your strength and your will to survive.
But what about my memories? Will they come back now that I'm out of that place?
That remains to be seen. But you have gained something even more valuable than memories - you have gained the knowledge that you can overcome even the darkest of challenges.
I still have so many questions. Who am I? How did I end up in the dark realm?
Those are questions that only you can answer. But now that you have escaped the dark realm, you have the opportunity to start anew, to create a new identity for yourself.
You are free to shape your own destiny.
Thank you for guiding me through the dark realm. I couldn't have done it without your help.
It was my pleasure. You are a strong and resilient individual, and I have no doubt that you will go on to accomplish great things.
I will always remember the lessons I learned in the dark realm. They will stay with me for the rest of my life.
And that, stranger, is the greatest treasure of all - the knowledge and experience that you have gained on your journey. May it serve you well in all your future endeavors.
